Subscription Example
[Programming How-To's]

A data subscription example. More...

A typical subscription example

Prep
  • Create user data types using rtiddsgen

Set up

  • Get the factory

  • Set up participant

  • Set up subscriber

  • Register user data type(s)

  • Set up topic(s)

  • Set up data reader(s)

  • Set up data reader OR Set up subscriber to receive data

Adjust the desired quality of service (QoS)

  • Adjust QoS on entities as necessary

Receive data

  • Access received data either via a reader OR via a subscriber (possibly in a ordered or coherent manner)

Tear down

  • Tear down data reader(s)

  • Tear down topic(s)

  • Tear down subscriber

  • Tear down participant
